Enter TODAY for a chance to WIN your share of R20 000 & nationwide fame!

homechoice blankets are treasured by millions of South Africans. Now we are giving YOU the chance to design a brand-new blanket AND have your blanket added to the homechoice range and sold nationwide.

A panel of experts will select the top three designs, and the public will get to vote for the WINNER!

Cash prizes and nationwide fame

Are you interested? Here is what you need to know!

  • ANYONE can enter. The winning design will be printed on our much-loved mink blanket fabric and will be 230 x 200cm in size.
  • The maximum amount of colours you can use in your design is 9
  • Your design must be original and reflect this year’s theme of ‘heritage’. Draw inspiration from your heritage or personal memories to design the new star of our collection - we want to know what heritage means to YOU!
  • Entries must be sent in PDF format [max size: 5mb] to competitions@homechoice.co.za with your full name, contact details and a short introduction to your design. Don’t forget to give your blanket a name! Entries close 30 March 2023.

Some creative inspiration to get you started

Here are some examples from our new blanket range to inspire you!

By signing up, you agree to receive electronic and other marketing through text, emails and other electronic channels from homechoice and FinChoice Africa about their retail, credit, insurance and other financial services products. Your personal information will be processed in accordance with our privacy policy.

Should your entry be selected as a finalist, your profile and photo will be shared in our marketing material & on our social media accounts. homechoice will own the rights to the winning design, and the winner(s) will not earn any royalties from the sales.
Ts&Cs apply
